articles.description: To find the the best custom bookshelf makers in New York City, we polled dozens of stylish and savvy New Yorkers. Here, built-in bookshelves for any room.
articles.content:
Stephen Carr, stephen@treenail.com; 201-681-4128
Working from a converted barn in Walnutport, Pennsylvania, woodworker Stephen Carr mostly makes custom furniture for longtime clients like architect-… [+970 chars]

articles.title: Samsung extends four-year update commitment to Galaxy A24 - Android Authority
articles.description: The Samsung Galaxy A24 is now the cheapest A series phone to get onto the company's four-year Android update roster.
articles.content:
• Samsung now covers the newly launched Galaxy A24 with four years of Android updates.
  • The under $300 device will get updates till Android 17.
